issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.summary: Beeline command will fail when entireLineAsCommand set to true

comments.body: cc [~hsubramaniyan] for code review, since you are the original author.
Deferring this to 3.1.0 since the branch for 3.0.0 has been cut off. Please update the JIRA if you would like to get your patch in 3.0.0.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12819253/HIVE-14304.1.patch
